name: Dubai
info: Located in the eastern part of the Arabian Peninsula on the coast of the Persian Gulf, Dubai aims to be the business hub of Western Asia.

name: Malaysia
info: Malaysia, country of Southeast Asia, lying just north of the Equator, that is composed of two noncontiguous regions: Peninsular Malaysia.

name: Paris
info: Paris is located in northern central France, in a north-bending arc of the river Seine whose crest includes two islands.

name: Greece
info: Greece officially the Hellenic Republic, is a country located in Southeast Europe. Its population is approximately 10.7 million as of 2018
